message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe you might be interested in. I think $115 is a fair price, considering its value. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Bob.  How about we split the difference and settle at $110?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle at $107.50?
